mapper.insert: insert into tbl_calendar( id, loginAct, name, createTime, createBy, startDate, endDate, color, url, description ) values ( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{name}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{color}, #{url}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update tbl_calendar set loginAct = #{loginAct}, name = #{name}, editTime = #{editTime}, editBy = #{editBy}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, color = #{color}, url = #{url}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
